data.title: Would-be detective watching the bus
data.solution:
p=int(input())
intervals = [tuple(map(int,interval.split('-'))) for interval in input().split()]
pluses, minuses = zip(*intervals)
n=int(input())
observations = [*map(int,input().split())]
events = sorted([(t,'0 +') for t in pluses]+[(t,'1 -') for t in minuses]+[(t,'2 obs') for t in observations])

total = 0
result = []
for when,what in events:
    if what == '0 +':
        total += 1
    elif what == '1 -':
        total -= 1
    else:
        result.append(total)

print(' '.join(map(str,result)))
data.statement: The bus starts empty. People hop on and off the bus. You observe. Write down your observations.
data.constraints:
1 ≤ [[p]] < 10
1 ≤ [[n]]
The observation times are already sorted.
All times are 4-digit integers between {{0000}} and {{2359}} inclusive and can be interpreted as 24-hour <<HHMM>> timestamps.
All hop-on-hop-off pairs [[aaaa]]{{-}}[[bbbb]] satisfy [[aaaa]] < [[bbbb]].
data.stubGenerator:
read p:int
loopline p intervals:word(9)
read n:int
loopline n t:word(4)
write output
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> [[p]] the number of people;
<<Line 2:>> The list of [[p]] space-separated hop-on-hop-off {{-}}-separated time pairs;
<<Line 3:>> [[n]] the number of observations;
<<Line 4:>> The list of [[n]] space-separated observation times.
data.outputDescription: <<One line:>> The number of people in the bus at each observation time, space-separated.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

The bus starts empty. People hop on and off the bus. You observe. Write down your observations.
Input
Line 1: p the number of people;
Line 2: The list of p space-separated hop-on-hop-off --separated time pairs;
Line 3: n the number of observations;
Line 4: The list of n space-separated observation times.
Output
One line: The number of people in the bus at each observation time, space-separated.
Constraints
1 ≤ p < 10
1 ≤ n
The observation times are already sorted.
All times are 4-digit integers between 0000 and 2359 inclusive and can be interpreted as 24-hour HHMM timestamps.
All hop-on-hop-off pairs aaaa-bbbb satisfy aaaa < bbbb.
Example
Input
1
1010-1020
3
1005 1015 1025
Output
0 1 0
